pullRequest.title: Improve the docs to make them less confusing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Type of change

Bugfix
Documentation

Description
In #3745, a user pointed out this part of the documentation as confusing and as a reason why he installed the Co as well as the standalone TO and UO. This PR attempts to make it bit more clear and understandable.

commit.message:
Improve the docs to make them less confusing for users who end up deploying standalone TO and UO without really needing them - Closes #3745

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>
